packages.title: Restart — 3 sessions
highlights: Confidence reset and story refresh after a gap

packages.title: Sustain — 12 sessions
highlights: Cadence for balancing care duties and work

policies: Rescheduling: 24 hours’ notice; late changes count as used.
Blocks may pause between sessions by mutual agreement.
Confidential by default; minimal notes; deletion on request.
Coaching, not therapy; signposting if therapy/legal advice is safer.
Online within UK hours; invoicing in GBP.

checklist: I can commit 60–90min per week for reflection or experiments.
I accept that coaching is not therapy or medical advice.
I’m willing to run small tests and learn from results.

process.title: How the process works
process.description: A three to four month container with 60-minute sessions and light touch check-ins between calls.

steps.title: Orientation & consent
steps.description: We map responsibilities, non-negotiables and what support looks like to you.

steps.title: Design paced experiments
steps.description: We test options, practise scripts and rehearse conversations you want to lead.

steps.title: Embed routines that protect energy
steps.description: We build tracking rituals so you can sustain momentum without overextending.

process.note: Optional asynchronous feedback through voice notes or docs helps you integrate between sessions.

sections.heading: Scope
sections.body: Coaching supports clarity, decisions and self-leadership through questions and experiments.

sections.heading: Not therapy/medical
sections.body: We do not diagnose or treat; we may signpost to professional help when appropriate.

sections.heading: Confidentiality & limits
sections.body: We keep sessions confidential except where law/safety requires disclosure.

sections.heading: Consent & boundaries
sections.body: You can pause, decline, or stop any activity at any time.

sections.heading: Cancellations & data
sections.body: 24h reschedule window; session notes kept minimal and securely.

items.a: Online (video) by default; in-person by arrangement in London.
Start with a 20-minute chat; we’ll decide together with no obligation.

cases.title: Composite coaching glimpses
cases.description: Real situations blended from multiple returners so identities stay confidential.

items.title: Back after 3 years, worried about gaps
items.context: UK job search after a 3-year break; unsure how to frame caregiving.
items.coaching_moves: Mapped a 30-min 'first day' simulation; rewrote 4 CV bullets with CAR; rehearsed boundary language.
items.shift: Clearer language for gaps; sent 2 outreach messages with less avoidance.
items.disclaimer: Illustrative and anonymised; outcomes are not promised.

items.title: Rebuilding confidence post-burnout
items.context: Returning after burnout leave; anxious about pace and expectations.
items.coaching_moves: Designed gentle energy audit; practised asking for support; set weekly review ritual.
items.shift: Communicated capacity cleanly; reported growing steadiness instead of bracing.
items.disclaimer: Illustrative and anonymised; outcomes are not promised.

items.title: Translating new skills after study
items.context: Certification during break; needs hybrid-role repositioning.
items.coaching_moves: Reframed experience stories; prototyped networking outreach; tested answers.
items.shift: Entered conversations confident about naming boundaries and new value.
items.disclaimer: Illustrative and anonymised; outcomes are not promised.

items.title: Gentle 12-week ramp back with light structure and honest boundaries.
Weekly cadence; small experiments between sessions to build momentum.
Interview rehearsal that sharpens stories and fit—no hacks, no scripts.
CV/portfolio reframing to show recent proof of progress.
Simple pricing; pause between blocks; confidentiality by default.
